name: Leandro Simões
body:
### Who the $%&#@% are you?!
Hi! My name is **Leandro Simões**, I'm from Brazil and I'm a .NET Full Stack Web Developer and I'm completely in love with Web Development.

### Hum, intesting. What is your skills?!
Well, I work in my day to day with **C#, VB.NET, Javascript, CSS3, HTML5, Knockoutjs, JQuery** and some another Web Development Technologies.

### Do you know anything else?
Yeah, I have study a lot of **javascript**, so I'm learning cool stuffs with **Node.js, React native, a lot of Front-End Development, UX** and much more.

### How can I contact you?
See my GitHub profile

[![Leandro Simões GitHub Link][g2]][g1]

Follow me on my social networks

[![Leandro Simões Twitter Link][t2]][t1]
[![Leandro Simões Facebook Link][f2]][f1]
[![Leandro Simões Instagram Link][i2]][i1]

Or just mail me

[leandro.simoes@outlook.com](mailto:leandro.simoes@outlook.com)
